=== client
{
 "message": "foo"
}


=== server
{
 "message": "REPLY: foo"
}


=== client
{
 "message": "bar"
}


=== server
{
 "message": "REPLY: bar"
}


=== header
key: value

=== trailer
trailer-1: hello

=== status
{
 "code": "OK",
 "message": ""
}
